name: My Home ain't your toilet
description:
Oh No, you invited some friends to come over because your parents whern't home but everybody invited 2 more people. 

WASD to move, Space to interact 

For accessibility press G to disable strobo lights.

Unfortunately some idiot merged two old branches while submitting,
one  if(true) disable all interactions
and one containing a age old gamebreaking bug. 
We did not know there was a grace Period, we wheren't online. 

You can play the version here:  http://game.lars-h.de/

We also uploaded the same build to Dropbox for Timestamp proof:
It was uploaded withing grace period:  https://www.dropbox.com/s/z0nz75t26d2mwtx/WinGameV2.zip?dl=0

The name was a last minute switch from Party At My Place

This is getting out of control, call the cops to clear the party and try to minimize the damage until they arrive!

This game was made in last minute for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam

None of us have ever made a game and of course we went completely out of scope.

Hope you enjoy
